Description:
Technician II - Technical ServicesOur client is a Leading Company in the Entertainment Industry. They are now looking for a Technician Level-2 to join them.Roles & Responsibilities:Ensure the Operations and Technical teams are operating all equipment safely and are always competent.
Liaise with the teams for any quick services required under maintenance for Attractions and Buildings.
Continually liaise with the manufacturers and vendors to ensure all the equipment are fully operational
Effective servicing, preventive maintenance, annual testing and other programs are thoroughly carried out etcSkills
Skills:
Immediate Joiners 
Must Have Valid Passport
PLC training / competency certificates

Must have a minimum High School Diploma in engineering
Excellent command of both written and spoken English 
Hydraulics/ Pneumatics licenses or certificates of training

Air ticket for self
Insurance for self
Employment Visa
